#Notes

*change crash_year to years_since_2014
*need to deal with cyclical nature of hour
**use sin() and cos()
***xhour = sin(2pi * hour_of_day/24), yhour = cos(2pi * hour_of_day/24)



```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, message = FALSE)
```

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(skimr)
library(janitor)
library(lubridate)
library(viridis)
library(ggmap)
library(broom)
library(modelr)

theme_set(theme_bw(base_size = 18))

options(scipen = 999, digits = 4)
```

```{r}
source("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/conorotompkins/allegheny_crashes/master/scripts/03_clean_data.R")

df <- df_combined_allegheny_county_crash_data_2004_2017_cleaned

rm(df_combined_allegheny_county_crash_data_2004_2017_cleaned, df_combined_allegheny_county_crash_data_2004_2017_factorized)
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  mutate(casualties = fatal_count + injury_count) %>% 
  select(casualties, crash_year, crash_month, day_of_week, hour_of_day, illumination, weather, road_condition) -> df_model

df_model %>% 
  ggplot(aes(casualties)) +
  geom_freqpoly()
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  count(illumination, weather) %>% 
  complete(illumination, weather) %>% 
  replace_na(list(n = 0)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  mutate(illumination = fct_reorder(illumination, desc(n)),
         weather = fct_reorder(weather, desc(n))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(illumination, weather, fill = log10(n))) +
  geom_tile() +
  coord_equal() +
  scale_x_discrete(expand = c(0,0)) +
  scale_y_discrete(expand = c(0,0)) +
  scale_fill_viridis() +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank())
```

```{r}
df %>% 
  count(road_condition, weather) %>% 
  complete(road_condition, weather) %>% 
  replace_na(list(n = 0)) %>% 
  arrange(desc(n)) %>% 
  mutate(road_condition = fct_reorder(road_condition, desc(n)),
         weather = fct_reorder(weather, desc(n))) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(road_condition, weather, fill = log10(n))) +
  geom_tile() +
  coord_equal() +
  scale_x_discrete(expand = c(0,0)) +
  scale_y_discrete(expand = c(0,0)) +
  scale_fill_viridis() +
  theme(panel.grid = element_blank())
```


```{r}
model1 <- lm(casualties ~ ., data = df_model)
tidy(model1) %>% 
  filter(term != "(Intercept)") %>% 
  #arrange(desc(estimate)) %>% 
  mutate(term = fct_reorder(term, estimate)) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(term, estimate)) +
  geom_col() + 
  scale_y_continuous(limits = c(-.25, .25)) +
  coord_flip()
```

```{r}
df_model %>% 
  add_predictions(model1) %>%
  add_residuals(model1) -> df_results
```


```{r}
df_results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(casualties, pred)) +
  geom_density_2d(aes(fill = ..level..), geom = "polygon") +
  scale_fill_viridis()
```

```{r}
df_results %>% 
  select(hour_of_day, casualties, pred) %>% 
  gather(measure, value, -hour_of_day) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(hour_of_day, value, color = measure)) +
  geom_smooth()
```

```{r}
df_results %>% 
  ggplot(aes(day_of_week))
  
  
```
